\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{luainputenc}
\usepackage{geometry}
\geometry{verbose,tmargin=0.75in,bmargin=0.5in,lmargin=0.4in,rmargin=0.4in}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\title{Math 320 HW 8}
\maketitle

\section*{1)}

Let $G=D_{6}$ and let $H=\left\{ e,r^{3}\right\} $ be a subgroup
of $G$.

\subsection*{a)}

Show $H\trianglelefteq G$. ($H$ is a normal subgroup of $G$)

\subsection*{b)}

Find $G/H$.

\section*{2)}

Let $G$ be an abelian group and let $H\leq G$. Show $H\trianglelefteq G$.

\section*{3)}

Prove that any quotient group of a cyclic group is cyclic.

\section*{4)}

Prove that any quotient group of an abelian group is abelian.

\section*{5)}

What project option and topic are you choosing for your project? (This
isn't set in stone and can change).
\end{document}
